Name: Nocko
About the game: Nocko is a logical thinking game in which the player gives a Block command. The player has to navigate through several levels and increasingly difficult tasks. With the arrow keys the player shows in which direction the Block should go and with the enter key he carries out all orders. The Steam release was on March 11th 2021
